title: My Gear
description: Here is everything I use for coding, graphics and 3D animation and many other things.

body.raw:
### Desktop

- <u>**Acer Aspire 7**</u> - 15.6" FullHD IPS display, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, GTX 1650, i5-9300H
- <u>**Samsung Odyssey G5**</u> - 27" QHD, 144Hz, 1ms, 1000R curved display
- <u>**Razer Viper Mini**</u> - 8500 DPI, 6 buttons, 61g
- <u>**JBL Tune 510 BT**</u> - 32 Ohm, 20Hz-20kHz
- <u>**Dell KB216**</u> - USB wired keyboard, no backlight, black
- <u>**Genesis Carbon 500M**</u> - 300mm x 250mm x 3mm, steel black

### Coding

- **[Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/)** - Primary code editor
- **[Github](https://github.com)** - Code hosting and version control platform
- **[Github Copilot](https://copilot.github.com/)** - AI code completion
- **[Danity One Dark Pro](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=alexanderte.dainty-one-dark-pro-vscode)** - Chroma 2, lightness 2
- **[Kate Editor](https://kate-editor.org/)** - Secondary code editor, used only for quick code changes
- **[Droid Sans Mono](https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts/droid-sans-mono)** - 14px font size

### Terminal

- **[KDE Konsole](https://konsole.kde.org/)**- KDE default terminal
- **[Oh My Zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/)** - Zsh framework
- **[ZSH Autocomplete](https://github.com/marlonrichert/zsh-autocomplete)** - Real-time type-ahead completion
- **[ZSH Gentoo](https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/blob/master/themes/gentoo.zsh-theme)** - ZSH theme

### Apps

- **[Brave](https://brave.com)** - Primary web browser (Chromium based)
- **[Firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/new/)** - Secondary web brower, used for code preview and tests
- **[Notion](https://www.notion.so/)** - Notes and todo list manager
- **[Discord](https://discord.com)** - Chat app for friends and communities
- **[Figma](https://www.figma.com/)** - Design and prototyping tool
- **[Blender](https://www.blender.org/)** - 3D graphics and animations
- **[Gimp](https://www.gimp.org/)** - Image editor
- **[Inkscape](https://inkscape.org/)** - SVG creator and editor

### Media

- **[OBS](https://obsproject.com/)** - Screen recorder and streaming software
- **[Kdenlive](https://kdenlive.org/)** - Free and Open Source Video Editor
- **[Flameshot](https://flameshot.org/)** - Screenshot tool with build-in editor and uploader
- **[VLC](https://www.videolan.org/vlc/index.html)** - Media player
- **[PulseEffects](https://github.com/wwmm/easyeffects)** - Audio equalizer and effects

### Services

- **[Cloudflare](https://cloudflare.com)** - DNS, CDN and DDoS protection
- **[Vercel](https://vercel.com)** - Dynamic, static and Serverless web-app deployment
- **[Proton Mail](https://protonmail.com)** - Encrypted email service
- **[Proton VPN](https://protonvpn.com)** - Encrypted VPN service
- **[DuckDuckGo](https://duckduckgo.com)** - Privacy-focused search engine
- **[Replit](https://replit.com)** - Online code editor and compiler
- **[Hotjar](https://www.hotjar.com/)** - Website Heatmaps & Behavior Analytics Tools
- **[Google analytics](https://analytics.google.com)** - Website traffic analytics
